alert.note: Alert for Cody Foothills; North Big Horn Basin (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 3:29PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Big Horn and east central Park Counties through 400 PM MDT... At 329 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles north of Meeteetse Rim, or 13 miles southeast of Cody, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of west central Big Horn and east central Park Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Cody Foothills; North Big Horn Basin
